data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alonso-Zarazaga, Miguel A. (2013): Types of species of Apionidae (Coleoptera) described by Carl Peter Thunberg (1743 - 1828) with description of a new genus. ZooKeys 317: 89-101, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.317.5477, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.317.5477
